name: Puttin' Around
description:
Puttin' Around is a fun spin on online mini golf games which allow you to enjoy great experiences with your friends. The game currently contains two 18-hole courses, and a level editor for endless maps to share and play.

The controls and play style are intuitive and make it easy to jump into or host a game. Play along with your friends, or make new ones.

Key Features
  • Dedicated servers
  • Up to 10 player multiplayer
  • Level editor with Steam Workshop to share and download maps
  • Ball customization
  • Custom rule sets
